CustomField.description: This is populated by sales/operations. It is the utility rate class that a specific utility account has.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically populated for EDI-enabled utilities if related UDRP records have a Rate Class/Subclass matching a Rate Class record. Otherwise, manually populated by sales/ops from the Utility Bill and changed through the "Recalculate Subscriptions" button.
CustomField.label: Rate Class
